summary: Encapsulates the data and logic required to map MODFLOW 6 grid cells to MetaSWAP SVAT units, generating the coupling input file (mod2svat.inp) and optionally incorporating well sprinkling configurations.
business_intent: Provides the necessary linkage between a groundwater flow model (MODFLOW 6) and a surface water/soil moisture model (MetaSWAP) to enable coupled simulations, ensuring that cell-to-unit relationships and well interactions are correctly represented in the coupling file.
